nodes.description: 哈迪上月逃亡至阿德恩，试图恢复在分裂国家的权威
nodes.support_text: Hadi last month escaped house arrest by Houthi rebels... fled to Aden in a bid to re-establish his authority in the politically fractured nation.

nodes.description: 3月19日阿德恩机场遭袭击，总统宫遭导弹攻击
nodes.support_text: The fighting forced the airport's closure... an unidentified warplane launched a missile at the presidential palace.

nodes.description: 同周突尼斯国家博物馆遭23人死亡的屠杀事件
nodes.support_text: the massacre at the national museum in Tunisia, killing 23.

nodes.description: 3月20日萨那两座关联胡塞武装的清真寺遭自杀式爆炸
nodes.support_text: Suicide bombers attacked two mosques... during midday prayers at the Badr and al-Hashoosh mosques.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国宣称对萨那袭击负责并称系‘冰山一角’
nodes.support_text: The Yemeni branch of Islamic State is claiming responsibility... calling the bombings 'just the tip of the iceberg.'

nodes.description: 白宫称无明确证据证实ISIS责任，但指出其宣传意图
nodes.support_text: White House spokesman Josh Earnest would not confirm the claims... saying there was no clear evidence yet tying the group to the attacks.

nodes.description: 美国官员分析ISIS可能‘相当自由’宣称责任
nodes.support_text: one U.S. official told VOA Friday Islamic State seems to be 'quite liberal' in taking responsibility for such attacks.

nodes.description: Daveed Gartenstein-Ross认为多起袭击存在协调可能
nodes.support_text: Given the rapid succession of the attacks, one should have a strong hypothesis that there’s coordination.

nodes.description: 美国要求也门各方停火并寻求政治解决方案
nodes.support_text: The U.S. State Department called upon all actors within the country to halt unilateral and offensive military actions.

nodes.description: 联合国秘书长呼吁也门各方立即停止敌对行动
nodes.support_text: Ban Ki-moon... called on all sides in the ongoing fighting in Yemen to 'immediately cease all hostile actions and exercise maximum restraint.'

nodes.description: 联合国安理会谴责阿德恩机场和总统宫袭击
nodes.support_text: The U.N. Security Council condemned Thursday's attacks on the international airport in Aden... and an airstrike Thursday on the presidential palace.

nodes.description: MSF报告称阿德恩医院接收63名伤者，12人需紧急手术
nodes.support_text: MSF has received 63 wounded victims of recent clashes there... 12 requiring urgent surgery.

nodes.description: 多国支持哈迪重建权威，谴责胡塞武装
nodes.support_text: The United Nations, Arab Gulf nations and several western countries... supporting Hadi.

nodes.description: 也门分支发布网络声明
nodes.support_text: The Yemeni branch of Islamic State is claiming responsibility... calling the bombings 'just the tip of the iceberg.'

nodes.description: 极端组织声称负责突尼斯国家博物馆屠杀
nodes.support_text: The extremists claimed responsibility for this week's massacre at the national museum in Tunisia.

nodes.description: 官员敦促谨慎关联也门和突尼斯袭击
nodes.support_text: 官员敦促谨慎关联也门和突尼斯袭击

nodes.description: 亲前领导人部队与哈迪民兵在城市中心区域交战
nodes.support_text:
语义描述：亲前领导人部队与哈迪民兵交战
主语：Security forces loyal to Ali Abdullah Saleh
宾语：militia loyal to President Hadi

nodes.description: 4名亲前领导人战士和2名民兵在冲突中死亡
nodes.support_text:
语义描述：4名亲前领导人战士和2名民兵在冲突中死亡
主语：pro-Saleh fighters (4) and militiamen (2)

nodes.description: 双方在城市其他区域发生冲突
nodes.support_text:
语义描述：双方在城市其他区域发生冲突
主语：two sides
宾语：other parts of the city

nodes.description: 冲突各方便利化医疗物资通行
